title: Tajikistan Government Revenues
description: Government Revenues in Tajikistan increased to 17885.20 TJS Million in July from 15071.50 TJS Million in June of 2022. Government Revenues in Tajikistan averaged 5173.19 TJS Million from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 29478.70 TJS Million in December of 2021 and a record low of 9.10 TJS Million in January of 2000. Government Revenues refer to all receipts the government gets, including taxes, custom duties, revenue from state-owned enterprises, capital revenues and foreign aid. Government Revenues are part of government budget balance calculation. This page provides the latest reported value for - Tajikistan Government Revenues - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: National bank of Tajikistan
